Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Eric S. Kipe ""FatDad""
Reviews.Content: The Evo 4G I purchased from Amazon's merchant MidStar was defective. According to my local Sprint repair store the phone had been reprogrammed before I received it, Midstar's response was "I believe Sprint might not know how to activate the phone because we have purchased them directly from our Sprint supplier. We have also received activation instructions from them".  Really... The rep at the Sprint store was kind enough to replace the defective phone with one of their's, less than 10 minutes later I am out the door with a working phone. I guess they know how to program a phone after all.  Secondly, I was also informed that the battery that was supplied with the MidStar phone was not one of theirs. Ergo, also defective as it barely fits into the phone. $40.00 dollars later, I have a phone and battery that is what I paid for. Sprint customer service to the rescue.

Reviews.Title: NEVER AGAIN!
Reviews.Author: Whitney
Reviews.Content: 3 Days after I got the phone it stopped charging. I went to the Sprint store for them to take a look at it and that is when I found out that the phone had been tagged "DAMAGED BEYOND REPAIR" before I had even received the phone!!!! That was a complete waste of $250.00. I was very dissappointed and I will never order a product from this company again.

Reviews.Title: from Becca S.
Reviews.Author: Rich Martin
Reviews.Content: The HTC phone is really good.  It never  freezes, has a responsive touch screen, and it has really fast internet and web surfing.  I would definitely send the word out to everyone that this phone is a really terrific phone.  It's nice on the web and very durable.  It also allows you to watch videos with its awesome kick stand to hold it up.  It's just like a computer, only it fits in your pocket and it sells for a price that's not bad at all. I would definitely give it a five star rating with no problems.  Enjoy your new HTC EVO touch(:

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: pianomom
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in this phone! We've already had to take it in because it won't charge, even with a new battery.

Reviews.Title: Worst distributer. Dont buy from this company
Reviews.Author: MaryBeth
Reviews.Content: My husband and I ordered two of these phones "new". My husband activated phone his upon delivery. The very next day the screen stopped working. Luckily, since it was a "technical" issue, Sprint replaced his phone for free (we have insurance). I tried to activate my phone but the battery did not work. After advising this distributer of my battery issue, they sent me TWO new batteries, no questions asked. They didnt even request that I send the bad battery back (this is strange, any legit company would request this). After receiving the new batteries and FINALLY activating my "new" phone, I found that the very next day, the phone would not charge. I took the phone to Sprint and they advised that the phone was completely rusted on the inside, had random parts from Japan (not Sprint) in it and that the charger had been saudered on. The phone had major water damage and has been refurbished. Since it is a water damage issue, I have to pay my $100 deductible for Sprint to replace it. Why dont I have this distributer replace it? Because I dont trust them. Horrible company!

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: D. Bussell
Reviews.Content: I recieved the phone a lot sooner than I expected & was in pristine condition, not one single scratch, also enclosed was a silicone cover & a screen protector, very happy I chose this particular phone.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: h24eather
Reviews.Content: I posted a review a week after I got this phone, but now im retracting from that review. 2 weeks after I got the phone, the volume stopped working... Luckily, I had insurance on my previous phone so it carried over to this one. Brought it to the Sprint Dealer, and they told me the "Loud Speaker" was blown. Also, the associate also told me 5300 calls were made from this phone and the phone had been activated before. Great news to hear after I spent money on a "new" phone. The next problem came about a week later when the phone completely stopped charging. Leaving me to switch batteries with my husband so he could charge the dead one. Brought this back to the same sprint dealer, they informed me that the complete usb charging port in the phone had been damaged and there were no sodder(sp)left on it. Seriously? A month in with this crap??? Oh yeah, make sure you have insurance, they will charge you $100 to replace the phone, luckily a brand new phone from sprint is $700+ ( the only reason i did not return it)

Reviews.Title: Not Sold as described.
Reviews.Author: Steve Weltman "Steve Weltman"
Reviews.Content: This is not a new phone.  It's a refurbished phone.  Its certainly not as described.  The only thing new on this was the outer case.  The really important parts are the insides, which appear to have been really poorly repaired by some ill-informed reseller.Here's the bottom line...I bought this for a friend, not me, so I have no way to test this on my account (I am ATT, she has Sprint).  She tried it for a couple of days and it wasn't working as if it was new (tinny sounding, somewhat functioning pixels on the display, low audio quality in general).When I bought this from Amazon, I expected that it would be delivered in a couple of days on my Prime account...it took TEN days, which is just revolting.  They extended my return interval to 31 Jan 2013 and that's fine if it's working.  However, the phone was just returned to me for a return.  Now I am out $200 because some monkey at 5 turd distribution thinks I am trying to scam them.  Quite frankly, I will NEVER purchase from this vendor again, even if their price is 50% less than the next vendor.  Stay away from them.  No good service, no good products.

Reviews.Title: disguised as new, SD slot wont work
Reviews.Author: Chul Suk
Reviews.Content: Bought as new. Listed as new. Most likely a refurbished phone.I can live with that but the SD card wont work and for paying 180, they are lucky I am too tired to go through a return process. Otherwise, i can make calls and send text. Thatll do until im eligiable for an upgrade with spring in 6 mos.

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone( White)
Reviews.Author: Faustino Menendez
Reviews.Content: I'm too disappointed with this purchase, they sent me a used phone and I buy a new one, I had to return it and this is the time I have not gone back to receive and not to turn, be careful with this provider.

Reviews.Title: Really great phone, for a while.
Reviews.Author: Craig Dobis "Eggspert Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for a few months now. It's been very good, easy to use and fast. I noticed once in a while, the person I was talking to on the phone, would have trouble hearing me saying the volume of my voice was too low. Then other times the volume of my voice was fine.A couple of days ago, the microphone in the phone went dead and the only thing the person on the other end could hear was static.HTC support told me to soft boot, then hard boot the phone, but it didn't help. I now have to contact them again to say their support help did not work.The company seems very sincere in wanting to help me and the phone is still under the 1 year warranty, so I am sure they will take care of me and my phone.I might advise you to buy insurance on this model phone as I have seen and heard of a lot of HTC owners having microphone problems with their HTC EVO 4G.Will update later.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: My son bought this phone 2 weeks ago.  It has stopped charging (looks like a common problem reading the reviews).  We took it to the sprint tech center today only to find out that this phone is definitely not new, it has been refurbished in a very poor manner.  There were sloppy solder spots where the charger plugs into (sorry I do not know the technical term) and also there is a power connection that was very loose again with terrible soldering attempted.I bought him an external charger and Sprint gave us a second battery for free.This is definitely a false advertisement.  I wish my son would have read the reviews before purchasing this phone.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: The phone came earlier than expected in perfect condition. Been using it about a month now and have no complaints. A lot different than my old HTC EVO shift. But I like it.

Reviews.Title: Screen cracked
Reviews.Author: Kaela Seelow
Reviews.Content: The screen cracks so easily. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone because of that but everything else seemed to be fine.

Reviews.Title: Was great at first but after a while it became a paper weight
Reviews.Author: Lisa Lawson
Reviews.Content: This was a good phone in the beginning it worked good, after a few months the problems started. Would always freeze up and not work, the touch screen would not be responsive. Took it to Sprint multiple times and they said nothing was wrong, after so long the phone would be on but not be responsive and could not use the phone for anything. Again Sprint got involved and according to their tests there was nothing wrong. I don't know if it was an issue with the Android operating system or the phone itself.I don't recommend this phone unless it's a last resort, there is better stuff out there. I am never buying an HTC phone again after owning this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: just_jer
Reviews.Content: There was some initial confusion with this phone, however I have since learned that it wasn't necessarily the sellers fault.They have gone above and beyond to help remedy the problem we encountered with the Sprint phone.They have opened up a line of communication and are doing everything possible to have a satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great service (customer service)
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I recommend buying this from Pure Mobility. They are very helpful. They replaced a charger when it was not working perfectly very nicely. The product itself is great. It works well, and I love the GUI. If you are more technologically inclined, this phone is for you.

Reviews.Title: NOT RIGHT
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I bought the HTC EVO 4g White phone. Well got the phone and it was black. Went to charge it and it wouldn't charge. So figured it was the battery got a brand new battery and still want charge. I know it's not my phone charger so I am returning this item asap. Not good wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: speaker problems
Reviews.Author: Andrew K Benson
Reviews.Content: We bought our phone from Amazon hoping that it would come problem free but it did not.  The speaker does not work well at all on it.  It should not have been sent out in excellent condition when it was not.  I was disappointed in that.  The phone does work well otherwise

Reviews.Title: HTC EVO 4G
Reviews.Author: evelina
Reviews.Content: htc evo 4G phone. new in perfect condition, is working fast and is with full extras. if I can used back home in europe, never woud sale this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Condition
Reviews.Author: Lady Miya
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about purchasing a phone from this vender, but I have not had any problems and got a free case out of the deal.  Phone was in excellent condition.  Glad I purchased this phone.

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate
Reviews.Author: Paygi
Reviews.Content: This is not what was advertised. It was previously used and the "Evo" sticker fell off as soon as I opened it. I traded it in at my sprint store an hour after I got it. I was not a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Ugh....
Reviews.Author: Lucy Anton
Reviews.Content: Didn't work and was definitely not in 'very good' condition. Go to eBay if you're going to pull that s***.

Reviews.Title: Grest phone
Reviews.Author: Mark Neff
Reviews.Content: I love the HTC smart phone. Easy to use and has everything I need on a phone I like that

Reviews.Title: Summary
Reviews.Author: Leggs
Reviews.Content: This item came in very good shape and works well; glad to have purchased it and the battery also; great.

Reviews.Title: The phone didnt even connect to the phone service
Reviews.Author: Jay dee Eggleston
Reviews.Content: yes it works but it wouldnt take to phone service activation. The phone also had a bad battery i wouldnt hold a charge for more then a couple minutes.

Reviews.Title: not so well
Reviews.Author: Ailyn
Reviews.Content: It was the phone I expected , but I thought it was going to be white ! And no ! It turn out to be black. And when I put down the order it said it was going to be white ! Not good !

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: KrasiR
Reviews.Content: The Evo I ordered was from: Discount Electronics & Games, I received it on time. It had a naturally wear and tear as the details explained. It worked well. The battery runs fast, as expected with a used phone.Overall it's a good phone for a temp.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Otniel Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The cell and I liked this good and working perfectly .I'll keep watching your products Thanks so much brother. t

Reviews.Title: People you can trust.....
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Munoz
Reviews.Content: Something I would recommend to anyone who's looking for parts or a realiable company that specialize in customer saticfaction when it comes to packaging and deliveries made with ease. On safty wrapped and as they discribe time of arrival to the tee. This is the resources made to please anyone looking. Im going to be a customer to them til' years to come and I look forward towards their product and saving.from the distributors and "Amazon".

Reviews.Title: This is the most disappointing product I ever bought from Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "emjay"
Reviews.Content: This is the most disappointing product I have ever bought from Amazon, It came late,( Christmas gift grrr) and without a charger, it was not all white (just the back plate) and within a week or two the battery no longer took a charge.  Amazon customer service did an excellent job of trying to make this right.  They sent me a charge cable, ( unfortunately it too was defective) but I had an loaner until another charge cable was sent.  They also worked with the vendor to provide another phone that would take a charge.  By this time we are into mid February.  When the new phone came the back cover didn't quite fit, but we thought we would try to make do.  I was just informed by the person to whom I gave the phone, that 3 of the screws under the non fitting back  cover had come out, and that the phone no longer boots up but cycles when you turn it on.  I suspect it is not making proper contact because of the missing screws.  I am at my wits end.  HTC is a reliable company.  I have been using their products for over 5 years.  This was alleged to have been a new phone, but it seems to have been cobbled together with ill fitting parts by the vendor, and is not what I expect when I buy from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: purchased damaged phone
Reviews.Author: felicia Knight
Reviews.Content: The phone worked fine the first day or two then it wouldn't hold a charge and when I plugged in the charger it wouldn't Get a connection unless I held the plug a certain way and held it there. Turns out, the battery was swollen so I went and got a new battery. Still it wouldn't hold a charge and the mini usb port that u plug the charger into internally damaged. Oh, and the back cover of the phone won't stay on cause the little notch things that snap it together r broke off. Definitly not pleased and want a full refund or replacement.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Andrew R.
Reviews.Content: it can't not work in st lucia and i did not get a refund back, so because of dat dont like it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal
Reviews.Author: steve chang
Reviews.Content: My phone got stolen and need a phone shortly.Timely received the shipment and I like it, I guess it is better than spending $100 or more plus monthly paying insurance to get a phone. I'm waiting a period to upgrade eligible now and enjoy this phone which never had this brand before.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Erin W. Fadako
Reviews.Content: I hate this phone and am just holding out in principal because I don't want to shell out more money for a decent one.  The apps take a long time to load and there are long "loading" pauses frequently when I close out of an app to go to then home page.  The phone no longer receives my email, and the blue tooth only works half of the time.  I know it is not the network because I am on the same plan as my husband who has an iPhone and everything works fine for him.

Reviews.Title: Dennytrios sent me defective product
Reviews.Author: Bruce Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Got a phone that really good like new almost put it on my plan and all it did was power cycle over and over

Reviews.Title: I really love my phone
Reviews.Author: Karon L. Rowden
Reviews.Content: My only hold back is I need to get more memory for it but the phone has done much better than the phone I got through Sprint

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: claudia peñate
Reviews.Content: Is not good product i never gonna by this again  the battery dont work is a trash sorry but is true

Reviews.Title: worked
Reviews.Author: cw
Reviews.Content: Phone was a temporary phone for my daughter. It lasted just over 2 months.  It was fine until It stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone (White)
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: The Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone (White) work really wonderful.My old phone was dropped in water and was unable to use it. Theprice for a new phone would have been 150.00 for a replacementfrom Sprint. Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: cleanhead
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased used but came in all of the original packaging and looked brand new!  I am loving it.

Reviews.Title: terrible defected phone
Reviews.Author: Shannon Donnachie
Reviews.Content: The phone is defected. The battery looks as if it was chewed on by a dog. It randomly turns off and it is very frustrating. Waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: late
Reviews.Author: amber johnson
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I can complain about is that the phone came on a later date then it was supposed to. I started to panic, but when it got here I was happy with the results..The phone is in good condition and we never have any real problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: amberly
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in this phone. I bought it as a gift for my daughters birthday. First, the back of the phone didn't even go with the phone. I had to have the seller send a new back that wont get here until after her birthday. Second, I activated the phone and tried it out to make sure everything else was working and the phone turns off by itself and then wont turn back on until I take the battery out and put it back in. I was so excited about getting this that it was a huge disappointment all of the trouble that it has given me  :(

Reviews.Title: never used
Reviews.Author: markel wilkins
Reviews.Content: Charger portion of phone ripped out the first time unplugging phone... Never had a chance to use this phone evo

Reviews.Title: Aprint HTC Evo
Reviews.Author: Val Smith
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived quickly but it doesn't have the capability to do everything on line that my daughter wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: MY HTC EVO LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Barbie O'Toole
Reviews.Content: When I find a phone that is fantastic I try to have a replacement on hand just incase because you never know what might happen...now I need an outer case for this amazing phone ... protection is always the best !!!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't turn it on...
Reviews.Author: Lil mama
Reviews.Content: Phones ok for an older phone, I had it before, but the one I ordered was reported stolen, be careful.

Reviews.Title: Find a different seller
Reviews.Author: Adam Braun
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this one I owned 3 of these EVOs, so yes I am hard on them.  After a couple week the touch screen began to act funny. Eventually I was more of a headache using it than not having a phone. This is a great phone but don't buy it here.

Reviews.Title: Not what i would call my ideal phone.
Reviews.Author: Melody Cunningham "huge fan"
Reviews.Content: This was meant to be a temporary phone to get me to my next upgrade.  So I didn't have high hopes to begin with.  This phone uses a lot of battery an overheats easily. It was supposed to come with an extended battery, but it did not.  I did notice that it occasionally drops some of my contacts and then the contact will reappear elsewhere and then I won't be able to find it again.... Very odd. Phone is heavier than my last phone (Samsung Infuse, which I adored) . All in all this isn't too bad of a phone.  However, I don't believe I would buy another one and I may not recommend it whole heartedly to some folks.

Reviews.Title: Less than thrilled
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: Low battery life and nearly impossible to charge the battery. Not worth the aggravation. Some apps won't work. Videos will randomly not play.

Reviews.Title: faulty product
Reviews.Author: cameron
Reviews.Content: Completely unsatisfied! Phone isn't worth a piece of a half of the price they charged me. Just haven't felt like going through the hassle of returning it.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Domingo Diaz
Reviews.Content: the phone is  very quickly, but  is CDMA, my line is GSM, I want to know  how buy a battery to this model, the battery no main the charge...1

Reviews.Title: Ummm
Reviews.Author: Taisha C Davila
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone honestly but the saler that I got it from send it to me with a battery that does not stay charge n a charger that don't really works but other then that the is perfect

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: breiona kimbrough
Reviews.Content: Battery life SUCKS. I cant go anywhere without a charger or it will die.  I wouldn't suggest this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS PHONE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Meagan
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this . I had to return it , it was horrible. None of the buttons worked !!!! Waste of $$$

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: delights
Reviews.Content: This was a used phone however it seems to work very well haven't had any problems with it. I really like it.

Reviews.Title: bad review
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: phone sucks it was not a new phone there must have been water damage to the phone by the pink x's and scratches also no manuel sent and cant save pictures

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC EVO REview
Reviews.Author: Ms MB
Reviews.Content: I received the wrong phone at first in my shipment, but seller sent me the correct phone RIGHT AWAY and gotta say I JUST LOVE IT!!!!!  Seller was VERY HELPFUL with making sure the right product I paid for was received.So many features and apps that are available that I cannot say how AWESOME this phone is.Works great; takes great pics and videos; has capability to watch movies with kickstand for easy viewing;and LOVE the navigation system.Took the phone to Sprint and all my contacts and pics were easily transferred to new phone from old phone in 5 minutes.My insurance on old phone now covers new phone with no problems.Only problem was the battery that was with old phone woud not take a charge at all and Sprint does not carry this battery in house.  Had to go to a separate battery store to purchase AND THE SELLER REPLACED THE COST FOR THE BATTERY...(as I had hoped and expected) SO VERY IMPRESSED AGAIN!!!Would not hesitate to purchase from this seller in future and HIGHLY recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!!
Reviews.Author: angela
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on  this phone and I should have went with my gut! They battery life is horrible and the charger they sent does not fit! Had to wiggle it around to get it to charge..... The phone itself works fine. Just wont keep a charge!

Reviews.Title: new phone
Reviews.Author: Rashell qualls
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter was very pleased with phone. This was a replacement for here very satisfied with service. It is a very good phone to have

Reviews.Title: tech problem
Reviews.Author: melonie pitts
Reviews.Content: Having a lot of dropped calls...Sprint says there's something messed up inside the phone and this phone should be replaced..but I like HTC phones.

Reviews.Title: Looks brand new...
Reviews.Author: ERROL
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is pretty heavy compared to a Samsung Galaxy Series phones.  The battery life is pretty short and drains quickly on regular 4G.  This phone is not 4GLTE.

Reviews.Title: Sort of happy
Reviews.Author: DAMON SALVATORE "KILLER"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad phone but the chrome letters were missingfrom the back and the digital zoom on the camera doesn't work. I don't know if it's this type of phone but people can't hear me very well. My old phone was a samsung and i had no problems.  I probably won't buy a refurb phone again.

Reviews.Title: sprint htc phone
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Phone was damaged and could not be used spent time and money trying to find someone at sprint to activate  it was happy with the girl at sprint for trying every option only to find out i was sold a defective phone

Reviews.Title: DAMAGED PHONE
Reviews.Author: Jessicamarie
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED MY PHONE LAST FRIDAY, AND IT IS ALREADY FALLING APART. I HAD PROBLEMS WITH THIS PHONE SINCE THE BEGINNING. IT TOOK SPRINT 1.5 HOURS TO ACTIVATE THIS PHONE BECAUSE THEY COULD NOT FIND THE THE DEVICE ID. THE REPRESENTATIVE STATED IT WAS A FAKE PHONE. 1 WEEK LATER; IT STARTED FREEZING, TURNED OFF ON ITS OWN, AND NOW IT SLOWLY STARTED FALLING APART.I HAVE A USELESS PHONE THAT DOESN'T EVEN TURN ON ANYMORE. ARE YOU KIDDING ME AFTER 1 WEEK???!!! I DIDN'T EVEN DOWNLOAD ANY APPS AND IT ALREADY BROKE. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!!!!! THEY ARE DAMAGED PHONES. I WAS RIPPED OFF.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as listed!! A lifesaver!
Reviews.Author: Amina "azanatarik"
Reviews.Content: My son broke his old cell phone and was able to find this model only $10 more than paying for a refurbished older model. Item arrived fast and exactly as listed. Thanks a lot!

Reviews.Title: Nice company, but....
Reviews.Author: William Atmur
Reviews.Content: the phone is not what I expected, the first phone was lost in transit and I never received. The second phone came it was pretty badly damaged, I was disappointed because I choose the phone that was in excellent condition. The customer service was friendly and prompt about making sure I received my second phone. I was just disappointed in the overall appearance and quality of the phone it self.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: emerald
Reviews.Content: I got this phone so i could get it flashed to cricket and its great like it was used but like new. I bought a pretty case for the phone and i ended up giving this phone to my sister and she loves it. This phone just turned out to be a great buy. Its nice to have a honest seller when it comes to big things like cell phones.

Reviews.Title: Dimensional Defect
Reviews.Author: Kelsey
Reviews.Content: The back piece did not fit the phone properly, nor did another brand new one I got from wireless toyz. The reason they're selling them is because the dimensions on the phone are off by a tiny bit. It must be some kind of defect. The phone did work all in all how it should, and it arrived cosmetically flawless. But compared to my Galaxy S2 Epic 4G touch, the processor was extremely slow. But that is probably just because it is an older phone.

Reviews.Title: Ridiculous battery life
Reviews.Author: Craig J. Schultz
Reviews.Content: I got this phone at Best Buy for Virgin Mobile b/c the choices were so few.  Paid about $270 and w/in a month regretted it. Charge will barely get you through an entire day even using battery saving features and w/o using 4G.  I can't even tell the difference b/w 3G & 4G on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Battery life is one day
Reviews.Author: kjanai
Reviews.Content: not the best, otherwise its fine I threw it in the box that garbage goes in. I could not give it away.

Reviews.Title: None functional phone
Reviews.Author: Thad Omari
Reviews.Content: The phone  could not work at all. I was unable to access the os I even tried to jail break I was totally locked out, according to sprint I needed a password in order to setup

Reviews.Title: it alittle issue
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: everything seemed fine but when I went to push the top botton to turn on It was soo tough lucky the phone was for my husband so he just had to man handle the phone to get it to work..

Reviews.Title: Wont Charge battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 2 months and now it wont charge the battery.  Have had problems the day I got this phone with the battery charging.  Had to wiggle and wrap cord around phone to keep charger in place.  Not to happy with my purchase. Guess that's what I get for buy a refurbished phone.

Reviews.Title: So far So good
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone to replace a broken one, in between upgrades. Price was right, nice looking phone. Was delivered on the day the scheduled arrival date stated. Only had about a week and the phone works great.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Forgr8ness
Reviews.Content: Much better than buying it in the store and nobody can tell the difference. Well worth the savings. Great Buy!!

Reviews.Title: Not what I excepted
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Mosley
Reviews.Content: The phone runs slow. It will stick on a screen and take up to about 10 seconds to unstick. Not for me.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: MonetG
Reviews.Content: They say the phone set to me was new, couldn't have been!!! It worked wonderful, until it op holding a charged. Then I found out this is a common problem with this model. Never again! Id rather buy my phone through my service provider!

Reviews.Title: awesone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The phone works perfectly with no issues.  My daughter loves it and she was excited it got her so quickly.

Reviews.Title: phone purchase
Reviews.Author: cab
Reviews.Content: there was an issue with my purchase but they were eager and quickly resolved the issue I would recommend them

Reviews.Title: Love my Evo
Reviews.Author: L. Walker
Reviews.Content: I love the Evo and I aways wanted the white one. The phone is great and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Purchase
Reviews.Author: Dana B. Howe "Cold Toes"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a refurbished HTC Evo 4g and I find this phone to be perfect for me! I had read multiple reviews on how some people order used ones and they ended up having a problem so I though refurbished was a better idea. Turns out I was right and now I have this awesome smartphone that can pretty much do anything. The only concerns I have are that you have to purchase the sprint premium data plan which is $10 more a month, and that the battery life tends to run out very quickly but you can just buy the extended battery for that problem. Overall, GREAT PHONE

Reviews.Title: Beautiful mobile
Reviews.Author: Ronnie L. Solberg
Reviews.Content: The product was beautiful, but the problem is that i live in Europe, and didn't know about the sprint restriction. so kinda failed there. The phone is sleek, sturdy and beautifully made. Its fast and one of the nicest phones i have seen out there. if your tired of your iphone and want something that works buy this one. Only in America ;)

Reviews.Title: Broke after a month
Reviews.Author: Andy C
Reviews.Content: The phone at first was really decent - ran fast, was good with calls/texting. After about a month the battery failed to charge. Sprint stated it was a motherboard issue. Ended up returning it.If you're feeling lucky, go ahead. It seems the other reviews are about 50/50 with it working.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt charge
Reviews.Author: Kan9110
Reviews.Content: It stop charge a month after I had purchased it, I took it to a sprint store and it couldnt be fixed plus it wasn't a new phone like the add said it was a sprint representative said it was a refurbised phone not happy at all

Reviews.Title: A great phone for an awesome price.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Sanchez "- Jenn"
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time and came with a very good case. It works perfectly and is an awesome phone for the price. Couldn't have asked for a better transaction. I have already recommended it to friends.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone <3
Reviews.Author: LivisMom "BreMarie"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone when it first came out and I still love it. My contract with sprint expired and I won't be going back with them. They are too expensive. Instead I'm going to have this phone flashed over to a new service. I can't bare to part with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, and new for gift to my cousin!!! :)
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Great looking HTC EVO 4g phone that my cousin wanted for a gift that I got for him.... Sprint was selling me a used 3D version one for about $360.00-$380.00 if I can remember. I was not going to pay that much especially for a display model. The one I bought was from Bargain Wireless  here from amazon and was a nice white color which he loved and got it connected and he told me works great so far!!!: )

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful
Reviews.Author: Miriah
Reviews.Content: The phone was in absolute perfect condition (minus a tiny chip in the paint, but they informed me of it beforehand.) It's just like brand new. And after I purchased the phone, they were so helpful with the questions I had.The next time I need a new phone, I will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: TG
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone by mistake without reading the fine print.This Sprint phone can not be used at my current location.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Just as expected!
Reviews.Author: sfsswim
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Sprint HTC Evo and it was new in the box as described. All parts were included in the box, and it was exactly what I wanted!

Reviews.Title: HTC EVO 4g
Reviews.Author: meghan
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for a little over a month, and it is by far the best phone I've ever had. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Quick service... Fast, fast, fast
Reviews.Author: Sophia
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my Htc Evo 4g. I ordered it Saturday and received it MondayI had it activated in 10 minutes. I am very pleased and will order from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Great service, great price, great product
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I bought a HTC EVO in white about a month ago.  I got the phone a couple days earlier than expected and in near perfect condition (refurbished phone).  I have been extremely happy with the phone and the customer service from the company.  All of my emails were addressed quickly and to my satisfaction.  This is my first over the internet purchase, so I was apprehensive about buying an expensive item.  After buying the phone, I will trust well rated sellers with a little less skepticism.  Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone (White)

Reviews.Title: htc evo
Reviews.Author: JOHN M KITCH
Reviews.Content: Like the phone itself But the battery life is real short.Mostly 3g picked up in our area, Would by another HTC phone in future

Reviews.Title: ONLINE ROBBERY!!!!1
Reviews.Author: elliott wong shing
Reviews.Content: I Hate i ever bought a phone online instead of going to the store, false advertising phone dont work it has water damage, seller never said anything about it. if i would had known i would have never purchase it. this was the 1st time i have use amazon for anything and it will be the last. cause know i stuck with a phone that dont work and i cant get my money back. so moving forward i chalk this up as a lesson learn never buy nothing from abyone on line no short cuts. just go the store so you will know what you purchasing. i feel like i got rob :(

Reviews.Title: wrong phone company
Reviews.Author: Douglas Bolton
Reviews.Content: I ordered the wrong phone I was Sapose to order AT&T; phone not a SPRINT PHONE that was a bummer on my part.

Reviews.Title: A
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Guerinot "kgbookworm"
Reviews.Content: It works good. Just as expected. Battery life on EVO is horrible, but that's just a problem with this model.

Reviews.Title: CONTACT ME ABOUT THUS PHONE THAT DOES NOT WORK.I WANT TO GIVE IT BACK(.FOR MY MONEY)
Reviews.Author: Wayne Lee
Reviews.Content: I was sent a phone that did not work. i have ask them to contact me please because at first i wanted to exchange thi phone, i got no answer. Now i want my money back. just tell me or help me return it to you. I still have it in the box it came in ready to ship.I am very upset.

Reviews.Title: CONTACT ME ABOUT THUS PHONE THAT DOES NOT WORK.I WANT TO GIVE IT BACK(.FOR MY MONEY)
Reviews.Author: Wayne Lee
Reviews.Content: I was sent a phone that did not work. i have ask them to contact me please because at first i wanted to exchange thi phone, i got no answer. Now i want my money back. just tell me or help me return it to you. I still have it in the box it came in ready to ship.I am very upset.

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone
Reviews.Author: Brianna Staton
Reviews.Content: The phone lasted a good three weeks.I bought it brand new and  It froze every five seconds it called people out of random  and I ended up busting the screen out of pure anger and it was probably the worst investment I've ever made. I reverted back to my old Samsung moment I had prior to the piece of crap evo I bought and this phone has been durable for the past almost three years. I will probably never buy another HTC phone again

Reviews.Title: quiero saber si estos telefonos son liberados
Reviews.Author: keylis
Reviews.Content: buenas tardes,me gustaria saber si este celular htc evo esta liberado para ser usado en otro pais.gracias.keylis

Reviews.Title: phone did not even work!!!
Reviews.Author: Slizardo17
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived very quickly, appereance wise great no complains, but when I tried charging the phone it would not charge, so I decide to take it to the sprint store && they tell me the charging port is broken. I have them fix that problem && when thats fixed they tell me the phone keeps turning on & off by itself it wont even last on long enough to go to the home screen, & they said this phone was "new" .... very dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: is a GSM phone. Does it use Sim Card?
Reviews.Author: Braulio Terrero
Reviews.Content: Hello Jacqueline,before the purchase, I need knows if the HTC evo 4g is GMS phone. does it use sim card?regards

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Luvly2nv
Reviews.Content: I had an great experience with dealers who sold this item. They were willing to work with me when a problem occurred with the item I appreciated that dearly.

Reviews.Title: Evo 4g paint is peeling
Reviews.Author: Amauri
Reviews.Content: We have 2 Evo 4G ,and i would not recommend it to anyone. Without scratches or dropping,the white paint is peeling and its red behind the paint. Thousands of people having the same problem.  Do not buy it!

Reviews.Title: HTC Evo 4G (White)
Reviews.Author: Christina M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a month ago and I'm very pleased with it. There are a few issues with it as is with all HTC EVO's. But I am very happy with the phone. Amazon is a great place to purchase phones from. I recommend this site to my friends and family..

ProductInfo.Features:
also includes extended life battery and cover
white back
ProductInfo.Name: Sprint HTC Evo 4g Smart Phone (White)
